original_text: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate, Write not, The King of the Jews; but that he said, I am King of the Jews.
korean_text: 유대인의 대제사장들이 빌라도에게 이르되 유대인의 왕이라 쓰지 말고 자칭 유대인의 왕이라 쓰라 하니

sentences.original_text: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate
Write not, The King of the Jews
I am King of the Jews
